text:
Hi Guys!
I'm Benny.
My first day in the community (Yay!!)
So, I have a quick question, might be dumb since I'm new to this...

When I fetch an contact by profile API I get multiple properties like 50
But if I fetch the contact properties alone I receive more that 200 fields,  so the question is how can I get all the fields value (it can be null or can contain value) with the profile data?

Thank you.

Hi,
I have implemented the authentication with my HubSpot application. Now I want to set some values as global variables against based on the response of the authentication API. How can I achieve this thing ? As based on auth token user will be able to watch his stored data in the custom actions forms.

Example : When user tried to install my hub app then a page appears which asks for API Key and this api key is sent to my server to verify and in response we get user information. Now I want to save this user auth token in HubSpot application somewhere as global variable so that custom code actions of my HubSpot application will work smoothly based on that auth token for each user. How can I achieve this thing. Please guide.

Hi,
Can anyone help me out with search  *<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/meetings|/crm/v3/objects/meetings/search>*
*I need to list the meetings where the user is an* participant or created by him
anyone here familiar with webhook validation, especially in node js. There seems to be something wrong with my validation because I'm not getting the same signature as the one being provided

I think…when it comes to reporting, datetime properties will be assessed uniformly base on account level time zone settings. Sounds like that’s Pacific for your client. I’d definitely recommend confirming firsthand though.

Has anyone else been having consistent issues with the property creation API lately? For the past few weeks I have been getting 500 internal server error, and now I am getting 400 property failed validation - can't figure out why for either.

Hello! Has anyone ever tried to get all the company domains using the API? I.E
Company 1, primary domain: <http://co1.com|co1.com> all domains:<http://co2.com|co2.com>;<http://co3.com|co3.com>;<http://co4.com|co4.com>;<http://co5.com|co5.com>;<http://co6.com|co6.com>. Any help would be appreciated!

Hi, question: can you use one accesstoken generated by oauth for all connected portals to app? Or you must generate each accesstoken seperate for each connected portal?

I need to know so when i want to get a new accesstoken by the refreshtoken i must now if i need to do it for one time or foreach portal

hi, who can help me please?
when I send any requests, I get an error about being blocked: "Sorry, you have been blocked. You are unable to access <http://hubapi.com|hubapi.com>."
